In *[NetHack](/wiki/NetHack "NetHack")*, the **en dash** or **short dash** symbol (**-**) serves the following purposes:

- \- represents a horizontal [wall](/wiki/Wall "Wall").
- \- represents an open [door](/wiki/Door "Door") in a vertical wall.
- \- is used to draw horizontal [rays](/wiki/Ray "Ray").

* Pressing [-]() followed by a direction will cause you to attack in that direction regardless of what is there - this is useful for attacking invisible or mimicked foes, pets or peaceful denizens of the dungeon, without a prompt for safety.
* For some item prompts, pressing [-]() chooses your hands instead of an item, e.g. you can [engrave](/wiki/Engrave "Engrave") with your finger, [wield](/wiki/Wield "Wield") nothing and fight [bare-handed](/wiki/Bare_hands "Bare hands"), or apply [grease](/wiki/Grease "Grease") to your hands. For other item prompts, you will mime performing the action instead.
* In a [menu](/wiki/Menu_controls "Menu controls"), pressing [-]() deselects all items.

[![This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.7. Click here for more information.](/images/f/f7/Nh367-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.7. Click here for more information.")

-

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
Printable ASCII characters
~ ! @ # $ % ^ & * ( ) _ + space
` 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 0 - = { } |
Qq Ww Ee Rr Tt Yy Uu Ii Oo Pp : " [ ] \
Aa Ss Dd Ff Gg Hh Jj Kk Ll ? ; ' Ctrl
Zz Xx Cc Vv Bb Nn Mm , . / < > Alt

In NetHack, the en dash or short dash symbol (-) serves the following purposes:

  • - represents a horizontal wall.
  • - represents an open door in a vertical wall.
  • - is used to draw horizontal rays.
  • Pressing - followed by a direction will cause you to attack in that direction regardless of what is there - this is useful for attacking invisible or mimicked foes, pets or peaceful denizens of the dungeon, without a prompt for safety.
  • For some item prompts, pressing - chooses your hands instead of an item, e.g. you can engrave with your finger, wield nothing and fight bare-handed, or apply grease to your hands. For other item prompts, you will mime performing the action instead.
  • In a menu, pressing - deselects all items.

rawPage:
{{ASCII}}
In ''[[NetHack]]'', the '''en dash''' or '''short dash''' symbol ('''-''') serves the following purposes:

* {{lightgray|-}} represents a horizontal [[wall]].
* {{brown|-}} represents an open [[door]] in a vertical wall.
* {{white|-}} is used to draw horizontal [[ray]]s.

* Pressing {{kbd|-}} followed by a direction will cause you to attack in that direction regardless of what is there - this is useful for attacking invisible or mimicked foes, pets or peaceful denizens of the dungeon, without a prompt for safety.
* For some item prompts, pressing {{kbd|-}} chooses your hands instead of an item, e.g. you can [[engrave]] with your finger, [[wield]] nothing and fight [[bare hands|bare-handed]], or apply [[grease]] to your hands. For other item prompts, you will mime performing the action instead.
* In a [[Menu controls|menu]], pressing {{kbd|-}} deselects all items.
{{nethack-367}}
[[Category:ASCII]]
